courses.title: 組織を動かす！今日からはじめるデータ分析の『超』基本~データ分析はデータドリブン時代・DX推進に必須なリスキリングスキル
courses.bio: デキるビジネスマンの条件は「データや数字を使えること」。高度な専門知識やツールがなくても、客観的に問題をとらえ、解決策を提案すれば、相手を動かすことができます。３時間で「”超”基本だけど意外とできていないこと」を一緒に学び直してみませんか？
objectives: 良い分析と残念な分析の違いが分かります
専門的な知識やツールを使わずに、現状を客観的に分析する方法が分かります
データ分析・データ解釈に必要な最低限の基礎知識が身につきます
分析の基礎知識：平均値・中央値・最頻値、分散、標準偏差などが１から理解できます

はじめに: 実際にあった業務上の会話
本コースの特徴と対象者
データ分析の基本ステップ: データ分析・リサーチの違い
ローデータ／度数分布表／ヒストグラム
【ワーク】度数分布表とヒストグラムの作成
【解答】度数分布表とヒストグラムの作成
生成AIで度数分布表を作成
現状分析のポイント（補足）
分析力を高める5つの視点: 分析力を高める5つの視点
【ワーク①】クロス集計表の読み方
【ワーク②】クロス集計表の読み方
「分布」の視点　－代表値と散布度－
基本統計量の理解: 分布・標準偏差・範囲
まとめワーク: 問題解決につながる分析
【確認テスト】コースの理解度をチェックしよう: 【確認テスト】コースの理解度をチェックしよう
+α セクション：ChatGPTを活用した要因の仮説構築: 本セクションの位置づけ
chatGPT活用力を高めるために
学びの深め方・広め方: 本編視聴完了後の講座レビューのお願い
データ分析・データ活用関連のスキルアップガイド
DX推進や生成AI活用に関する【人材育成担当】の方へ

requirements: 受講条件や事前準備は特に必要ありません。
数学や統計の基礎知識が０でも大丈夫です。ご安心ください。
ワークがありますので、Excel・PowerPointもしくはKeynoteをご用意ください。
courses.description:
DXの定義はデータやテクノロジーを活用して、ビジネスを変革することです。デジタル化・システム化によって保有できるデータは種類も量も増え、データドリブンでビジネスのPDCAを回すことは当たり前の時代になりました。
一方で、データ活用・データ分析において次のような悩みを持つ方も増えています。

・そろそろ自分もデータ分析に挑戦してみたいが、何を・どう分析すれば良いかわからない
・上司からデータや数字を使えと言われるけど、使い方がわからない
・平均・相関・標準偏差などの基礎知識を学びたいが、周りに教えてくれる人がいない
・分析をしても、上司や組織を動かす良い提案が出せなくて悩んでいる


皆さんも、このように困っていませんか？
大丈夫です。本講座がそれを解決します！

本講座ではこれからデータ分析を始めたいビジネスパーソン向けに、データ分析の超基本を【丁寧に・わかりやすく】解説します。超基本ですが、基本ができていない人が多いのも事実。無数の分析・報告書を見てきたデータ・リサーチビジネスの現役経営者で、延べマネジメント人数500名を超える講師が「これだけは絶対にできてほしい分析」のコツを詰め込んだ講座です。

ワークで実際に手を動かしながら、【何を・どのように分析すれば良いか】を考える「分析脳」をつくる３時間です。

わたしも日々の仕事で多くの社員・顧客・パートナー企業とやり取りをしていますが、「社員の残業時間は増えていると思います」「お客様の予算がどうやら減っているようです」「本商品を導入された他社でも良い成果が出ています」など、客観的なデータや数字の裏付けがない分析や提案は思いのほか多いものです。
このような主観的な分析・提案を聞いても、組織を動かす意思決定はできません。

あらゆる分析の目的は、問題解決につながる意思決定やアクションをうながすこと、つまり組織を動かすことです。
本講座で分析脳をインストールすれば、あなたの分析や提案が上司や組織を動かせるようになります。


■講座内容の抜粋
・ データ分析とリサーチの違い
・ ローデータ、度数分布表、ヒストグラム
・ 現状分析のステップ
-問題の特定
-要因分析
-解決策の提示
・定量データと定性データ
・ 分析力を高める5つの視点
-分析目的
-比較
-構造
-関係性
-分布（相関関係、因果関係など）
・ 基本統計量の理解（平均・ 分散・標準偏差・範囲など）
・ 問題解決につながる分析のポイント２０
target_audience: データやファクトを使った分析をこれから始めたい方（初学者・初級者）
加重平均、幾何平均、疑似相関という言葉の意味がわからない方
営業、人事・総務・広報・システム開発など、データ分析の必要性を感じているが学ぶ機会がなかった方
データ分析やリサーチを日常的に行っている方、企画・マーケティング・財務部門の方には物足りないと思います
専門知識がなくても、組織を動かす分析ができるようになりたい方

courses.title: Curso Power BI – Análisis de Datos y Business Intelligence
courses.bio: Curso de Power BI en Español - Datos desde Excel, Dashboards, y DAX en Microsoft Power BI ¡Power BI Desktop es gratis!
objectives: Transformarás datos en asombrosas visualizaciones interactivas de una manera muy dinámica: Todo esto con herramientas gratuitas.
Cualquier persona, de cualquier posición o industria, puede tomar este curso: Es seguro que los proyectos prácticos te van a ser de gran utilidad.
Certifícate y empieza a ser más productivo en tus actividades: ¡Analiza y toma decisiones rápidamente, deja atrás ese estrés y desorganización, confía en tu información!
Tendrás el conocimiento y la habilidad requeridos para indagar más allá de las funciones de Power BI y encontrar soluciones a problemas complejos.
Al final del curso podrás descubrir con reportes de gran calidad para uso personal, inspirar a tus compañeros, persuadir a tus clientes, ¡y más!

Interés por practicar y preguntar: Cualquier duda que tengas durante el curso tendrás soporte uno a uno en cuestión de minutos ¡Compruébalo!
courses.description:
En este curso de Power BI en español vas a aprender como hacer informes y reportes con dashboards en distintos proyectos, ejercicios y prácticas ¡Power BI Desktop es gratis!
DESCRIPCIÓN DE CURSO
Microsoft Power BI es uno de los programas con tecnologías de Business Intelligence más robusto en el mercado, y al mismo tiempo es uno de los más baratos ¡incluso gratuito! Cualquiera puede iniciar a desarrollar reportes con visualizaciones interactivas gratis. Si eres dueño de un negocio, gerente de un departamento, o simplemente tienes interés en analizar y dar seguimiento a tus actividades y objetivos, entonces este curso es para ti.
En este curso realizaremos múltiples proyectos desde cero, en donde tomaremos datos de distintas fuentes, los transformaremos y el resultado final: reportes interactivos sorprendentes.  Es así como al terminar este curso, además de certificarte, contarás con las habilidades y conocimientos para crear visualizaciones usando tus propios datos y poder así cumplir con tus metas.
El enfoque de los proyectos del curso es totalmente práctico, y con cada nuevo proyecto contarás con nuevos recursos, guías y archivos necesarios para desarrollar distintos reportes, en donde al instante podrás aplicar lo que estás aprendiendo. Asimismo, contarás con soporte directo del instructor, así como de un foro de preguntas y respuestas donde podrás participar con tus compañeros del curso.
Cabe destacar que cada sección se estará manteniendo y actualizando constantemente con respecto a Power BI se mantiene innovando, así como con las ideas de mejora de los compañeros. Tu retroalimentación será valiosa para el éxito total de todos.
Todavía hay más, se estarán agregando más proyectos en base a sus sugerencias y requerimientos del mercado, así que si terminas este curso, ten por seguro que al volver en unos días podrás ver nuevos proyectos que desafíen tus conocimientos y que te mantengan más actualizado y adelante de la competencia.
Échale un vistazo a nuestras vistas previas del curso, y si algo no queda claro con toda confianza ¡Contáctame!
Esta es tu oportunidad de descubrir más allá y de tomar decisiones que apunten al éxito.
¡Comencemos!
target_audience: Mi misión es ayudar a quien sea y de forma sencilla a analizar sus datos, eso te incluye a ti.
Si no conoces Power BI o crees que es complicado, te aseguro que no lo es. Inscríbete en el curso y en los primeros minutos verás que es sencillo y necesario en tus dispositivos.
Eres un estudiante, un profesional, dueño de un negocio, sea lo que seas, verás que esta herramienta te será provechosa.
Quieres mejorar en tu trabajo, buscar nuevas oportunidades, colaborar mejor con tus superiores, hacer presentaciones interesantes, Power BI es para ti.

courses.description:
Learn the basics of how to design, deploy and analyze with SelectSurvey v5!
SelectSurvey lets you easily create, deploy and analyze surveys online.
Surveys can be used for data collection forms, customer satisfaction, HR 360 forms, registrations, online training, feedback, and more.
SelectSurvey v5 is the 8th generation of Online Survey Tools developed by ClassApps Inc.
To use the software, all you need is a web browser and an internet connection.
ClassApps sells two versions of the product, one on the ClassApps cloud, called "SaaS" (Software as a Service), and one that you can install on your own server, called the "on-premise" software.
SelectSurvey has been widely used by many Universities, Research Organizations and Businesses since 2002.
SelectSurvey v5 predecessors included Select Poll, SelectSurvey ASP, SelectSurvey ASP Advanced, SelectSurvey.NET 1.1, 2.0, 4.0, and now SelectSurvey v5.
In this Basic Training Course, which is geared towards beginners, we will cover the major basic features of SelectSurvey v5:
Section 1: Introduction
Section 2: Navigating SelectSurvey
-SelectSurvey Navigation
-Custom Dashboard
Section 3: Creating Survey
-Create a Survey
-Add Questions to a survey - Open Ended email, choice - option buttons
-Add a YouTube video to a survey
-Question Validation
-Page Conditions
-Question Conditions
Section 4: Deploying Surveys
-Survey Options Response Types
-Survey Options Start/End Date, Survey Not Live
-Survey Options Timed Surveys
-Survey Options General
-Deploy URL
-Deploy via SelectSurvey Email List
-Deploy via 3rd Party Email List
Section 5: Analyzing Surveys
-Results Overview
-Export CSV
-Individual Responses
-Custom Report
Section 6: Basic Administration
-Archive Surveys
-User Management
-User Groups
-Survey Templates
-Survey Folders
-Libraries
For more advanced usage of SelectSurvey v5, see the "Power User Training" and the "IT Staff/Administrator Training" courses.
To request a free trial, go to the ClassApps website or email sales@classapps.com.
If you are already a customer and have questions, submit a help ticket to the service desk from the ClassApps website or customer portal.

courses.title: Contract Analytics 101
courses.bio: Driving Organizational Transformation With Contract Analytics

Introduction to Contract Analytics: Module 1 - Quiz - Introduction To Contract Analytics

requirements: No Contract or Analytics Experience Required For This Course
courses.description:
In today's fast-paced and competitive business environment, effective contract management is essential for success. However, with the increasing complexity and volume of contracts, traditional methods of contract management are no longer sufficient. Enter Contract Analytics – a powerful tool that leverages data-driven insights to revolutionize contract management practices.
In this comprehensive course, participants will embark on a transformative learning journey to master the art and science of Contract Analytics. From understanding the fundamentals to exploring techniques and emerging trends, this course equips participants with the knowledge, skills, and strategies needed to harness the full potential of Contract Analytics and drive business success.
Through a series of engaging lectures, real-world case studies, discussions, and quizzes, participants will:
Gain a understanding of what Contract Analytics is and why it is crucial for modern businesses.
Explore the key challenges in contract management and learn how Contract Analytics addresses them effectively.
Discover best practices for implementing Contract Analytics in their organizations, from choosing the right tools to preparing and cleaning data.
Learn how to maximize the value of Contract Analytics by optimizing processes, measuring success, and leveraging insights for strategic decision-making.
Explore advanced topics and emerging trends in Contract Analytics, including AI, blockchain, and natural language processing.
Understand legal and regulatory considerations, privacy concerns, and ethical principles relevant to Contract Analytics.
Receive practical tips, advice, and resources for success in their Contract Analytics journey.
By the end of this course, participants will be equipped with the knowledge, skills, and confidence to leverage Contract Analytics as a strategic tool for driving efficiency, mitigating risks, and unlocking new opportunities in their organizations.
Who should take this course:
Data scientists and Analysts eager to apply their expertise in data analytics to contract management challenges.
Procurement professionals seeking to enhance their contract management skills and drive operational efficiency.
Legal professionals interested in leveraging data-driven insights to streamline contract processes and mitigate risks.
Sales and finance professionals looking to optimize contract lifecycles, reduce revenue leakage, and enhance compliance.
IT professionals interested in exploring the intersection of technology, data analytics, and contract management.
Business leaders and executives seeking to gain a competitive edge by harnessing the power of Contract Analytics.
Join us on this exciting journey and unlock the strategic insights needed to propel your organization to new heights of success with Contract Analytics. Enroll now and take the first step towards mastering Contract Analytics!
target_audience: Supply Chain & Procurement Professionals
Legal & Contract Specialists/Managers
Data Scientists & Analysts
Company Leadership
Sales Leaders
Members of Finance
IT Decision Makers
Students and Anyone Interested in the Future of Contracts

courses.title: Nonprofit Program Perfection: Implementation That Works
courses.bio: Using Community-Defined Evidence to Create an Evaluative Culture | Leverage Four Great Tools for Program Design
objectives: How we define "programs" and "implementation" using implementation science.
Four phases of program implementation: exploration, installation, initial implementation, and full implementation.
How the behavioral insights implementation process model can support our improved program implementation.
Using the BSQ goal-setting model to establish behavioral and results goals.
The importance of community-defined evidence in understanding program implementation.
The role that an evaluative culture plays in implementation success, and how tools like the Quality Implementation Tool help.
Using the Implementation Stages Planning Tool and the Hexagon Tool to activate this important capacity and determine fit and feasibility.
Four ways to get your team on board and excited about building this important capacity.

Introduction: Introduction to the Nonprofit Program Perfection Course
Bronze 1: What is Program Implementation: What you can expect in this lesson
Bronze 3: What does Effective Nonprofit: What does effective program implementation look like?
Silver 1: Activating Your Own Program Im: What you can expect in this badge
Activating Your Own Program Implementation Capacity
Silver 2: How to Enhance Program Impleme: How to Enhance Program Implementation Practices in your Nonprofit
Silver 3: How to Set Goals Around Implem: How to Set Goals Around Implementation for Yourself
How to Set Goals around Implementation Improvement for your Nonprofit

requirements: No prior experience necessary.
courses.description:
About this course...
Program perfection stems from implementation, and implementation is all about how well an organization can bring its plans to life, ensuring that services and advocacy efforts are delivered with the highest quality. It’s not just about getting things done but doing them in a way that truly makes a difference, reaching the people who need it most and driving meaningful change. By managing every detail with care, from planning through execution, organizations can make sure their programs have a lasting, positive impact on their communities.
What You Will Learn
How we define "programs" and "implementation" using implementation science.
The importance of community-defined evidence in understanding program implementation.
Four phases of program implementation: exploration, installation, initial implementation, and full implementation.
The role that an evaluative culture plays in implementation success, and how tools like the Quality Implementation Tool help.
How the behavioral insights implementation process model can support our improved program implementation.
Using the Implementation Stages Planning Tool and the Hexagon Tool to activate this important capacity and determine fit and feasibility.
Using the BSQ goal-setting model to establish behavioral and results goals.
Four ways to get your team on board and excited about building this important capacity.
Who is this course for?
The principals of program implementation can be applied directly to those who are involved in program design and delivery as well as those seeking funding for programs and responsible for program evaluation and research. For non-program team members, you'll find the models within to complement your work in the richer understanding that you'll gain about community-designed evidence, evaluation models, and the motivations behind implementation science.
This course explores the following Korn Ferry competencies:
Instilling Trust
Valuing Differences
Drives Results
Optimizing Work Processes
Nimble Learning
target_audience: The principals of program implementation can be applied directly to those who are involved in program design and delivery as well as those seeking funding for programs and responsible for program evaluation and research.

courses.title: Data Products - Minimum Lovable Governance MasterClass
courses.bio: Lightweight governance that makes data products trusted, scalable, and business-ready
objectives: Why legacy data governance models don’t work for data products.
How to apply Minimum Lovable Governance (MLG) in practice.
Simple ways to link business goals with SLAs and data quality.
How to use agreements and standards to build trust.
Lightweight methods to scale governance across teams.

Introduction: From Enterprise Architecture to Data Products — Strategic Alignment-by-Design
From Data Management to Data Products — Measuring Value-by-Design
From Raw Data to Data Products — Value Creation-by-Design
From Data Contracts to Data Products — Outcomes-by-Design
The Minimum Lovable Governance Model: Core Components and Use of Minimum Lovable Governance
Connecting SMART Objectives and KPIs to Data Products
Standards in Context – Compliance Where It Matters
Archetypes define what kind of product we’re building
Templates show how to build it consistently through lifecycle
Data Product Design Guide - binding all together
Case: Business Objective and 5 Data Prod: The Wake-Up Call & MLG as the Answer
Integrating MLG & ODPS with Modern Data: From Medallion Layers to Data Products: Applying ODPS for Maximum Value
From Raw Vault to Business Value: Using ODPS with Data Vault 2.0

requirements: No prior experience with data governance frameworks required.
A basic understanding of how organizations use data (analytics, reporting, or digital services) is helpful but not mandatory.
Curiosity about how to move beyond traditional data management toward product thinking.
courses.description:
Are you tired of data governance that feels like red tape instead of real impact?
Most organizations still treat governance as a compliance checklist—something to slow down innovation, not accelerate it. Meanwhile, business leaders keep asking: “Where’s the ROI from all this data?”
This course introduces Minimum Lovable Governance (MLG), a modern approach designed specifically for data products.
Instead of endless rules and policies, you’ll learn how to embed just enough governance to deliver trust, quality, and business value—without killing agility.


What you’ll discover inside:


How to shift from managing data as an asset to delivering data as a product.
Practical frameworks like the Open Data Product Specification (ODPS) that bring governance to life.
How to automate SLAs, data quality, and compliance checks as code.
Clear methods to measure business outcomes, not just technical outputs.
Tools and templates you can apply immediately in your own organization.
Terraforming Data Product Governance book
Why this matters:


Drive business value: Turn raw data into products that solve real problems.
Boost your career: Master a future-ready skill set in high demand worldwide.
Make governance lovable: Learn to balance control with speed, trust with innovation.


Whether you’re a data professional, manager, or business leader, this course gives you a proven blueprint to move beyond old-school data management and become a champion of data product value creation.
target_audience: Data leaders who want governance to drive measurable business outcomes, not just compliance.
Product managers and data product managers ready to apply product thinking to governance.
Business and technology managers looking for a practical way to align data investments with ROI.
Governance professionals who feel existing frameworks are too heavy and want a lightweight alternative.
Anyone working with data products who wants tools and methods to make them trusted, scalable, and business-ready.

requirements: No hay requisitos previos para realizar este curso. Basta tener una computadora con Windows 10.
courses.description:
Si eres un principiante en el mundo de la visualización de datos y estás buscando una manera de aprender a utilizar Power BI, este curso es para ti. Aprenderás todo lo que necesitas saber sobre Power BI desde cero, desde la conexión de datos hasta la creación de gráficos y la definición de KPI.
Una de las primeras cosas que aprenderás en este curso es cómo conectar diferentes fuentes de datos, como Excel, la web y PDF, para utilizarlos en Power BI. Aprenderás cómo hacer esto utilizando Power Query, que te permitirá transformar tus datos de manera eficiente.
Una vez que tengas tus datos conectados, comenzarás a crear diferentes tipos de gráficos, como barras, circulares, treemaps y series de tiempo. Aprenderás cómo utilizar estas herramientas para visualizar tus datos de una manera clara y concisa, lo que te permitirá tomar decisiones más informadas.
Además, también aprenderás sobre DAX, una herramienta que te permitirá crear medidas personalizadas y calculadas. Con DAX, podrás crear KPI y reportes personalizados para que puedas ver fácilmente cómo están funcionando tus negocios.
Finalmente, aprenderás a diseñar reportes y definir KPI utilizando Power BI. Esto te permitirá presentar tus datos de manera efectiva, lo que te ayudará a tomar decisiones informadas sobre el futuro de tu negocio.
Al final del curso, habrás desarrollado tu primer reporte en Power BI, lo que te permitirá comenzar a utilizar esta herramienta para mejorar tu negocio y tomar decisiones informadas basadas en datos.
En resumen, este curso te proporcionará todas las habilidades necesarias para comenzar a utilizar Power BI para visualizar y analizar tus datos de una manera efectiva. Desde la conexión de datos hasta la creación de gráficos y la definición de KPI, este curso te enseñará todo lo que necesitas saber para empezar a utilizar Power BI con éxito.
Inscríbete hoy y comienza a dominar Power BI para el análisis de datos y la visualización de resultados.
¡No pierdas la oportunidad de avanzar en tu carrera con una de las herramientas de análisis de datos más poderosas del mercado!
target_audience: Estudiantes y profesionales que quieran entrar en el mundo de los datos y el Business Intelligence.
Estudiantes y profesionales que quieran aprender a utilizar Power BI.

requirements: Basic Knowledge of Requirements Elicitation
Basic Knowledge of Business Analysis
Good at Building Trust and Relationships
courses.description:
Who are the experts at asking questions and getting answers?
Detectives & FBI Agents of course!
Why?
They understand natural human instincts that drive all of us and know how to use them to their advantage
The know which Techniques, Approaches, and Tools to use and when to use them
Are good at identifying when someone is resistant to providing them with information
I have researched techniques that are taught by the FBI and Homeland Security. I have taken these techniques and adopted them for Requirements Gathering and Elicitation. These are powerful tools to get the information you need to be more successful at defining requirements for Project and Product Delivery.
This course focuses on the 2nd BABoK Knowledge Area: Elicitation and Collaboration.
- Specifically sections 4.1 to 4.3 Preparing, Conducting, and Confirmation Elicitation.
Requirements elicitation is not simply gathering requirements. Requirements are not just lying around waiting for you to pick them up and write them out. Many times the users or clients themselves are not sure of what they want. All too often the most obvious requirements are wrong or incomplete. Requirements elicitation is all about learning & understanding the need by seeking, uncovering, acquiring, and elaborating.
CommonSense tells us if we want to elicit the requirements like the best of them, we need to learn from the experts. Who better than the FBI or detectives for getting information? If you want to learn how to elicit requirements when the information when workshops and job shadowing aren't giving you the information you need, then this course is right for you.
Note: These are not national secrets. The information used as my research is from the FBI and Homeland Security, but it is information that is available to the public.
target_audience: Business Analysts
Product Owners
Scrum Masters
Enterprise Architects
Solution Architects
Agile Teams

courses.bio: Tableau is used by thousands of companies worldwide. This quick start course will provide you a foundation in Tableau.

Understanding Timeseries in Tableau [Hint - it's paramount]

requirements: Nope. Just a desire to learn.
courses.description:
So imagine you have a big list of data (say for example in Excel, SQL, MS Access, MySQL, Oracle, etc.) suffice to say that data is practically unreadable.  Let's be honest, there is no real way for the data makes sense.  Or put another way how do you make heads or tales  out of something so illegible? This is where Tableau can save the day.  :)
With Tableau you can create really cool, slick, visualizations (AKA charts) that allow you to interpret your data in "picture" form to learn the story it's telling you.  Tableau is highly intuitive, incredibly powerful and flat out fun to use.
This course has been designed to provide a high level overview of the foundational topics in Tableau, with the hope you will take what you learn and apply it to higher levels of Tableau.
The course begins with an overview of Tableau, of which we dub "kicking the tires", from there you will get an intro to calculations on Tableau, then the fun begins--- with a whole module dedicated to common Tableau visualizations, culminating with showing you how to create dashboards and storylines.
Each module/ video tutorial is topical in nature and you can pick and choose the order in which you learn since there is no true progression path to the course.  That said, we've tried to arrange the content so it has the best and easy logical flow.
Topics you will learn: Connecting to data sources, basic chart formatting, sorting, filtering, basic calculations, common Tableau visualizations, dashboards and storylines.
This course is designed for beginners/ novices in Tableau so experienced people need not apply.  :)


** IMPORTANT** This course uses Tableau 9 which is not the most recent version of Tableau since the video series was put together a few years ago.  However all the content within the class applies to Tableau 9.x and higher, just note your screen may look a little different.


So why is this course free?  Simple. By chance this course can help someone, somehow, someway stay afloat economically, move to a better vocation, or allow them a better career....it's well worth it in my view.  ~ Dave (the course author)
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn Tableau, or looking to convert raw data into understandable visual format.
The content in this course applies to Tableau 9.x and higher

Welcome to "101 Essential Excel Tips for Data Analysts," where you'll learn practical and effective ways to use Excel for data analysis. This course is perfect for anyone looking to improve their Excel skills, whether you're just starting out or have some experience but want to get better.
In this course, you’ll:
Discover Key Functions: Master important Excel functions and formulas that are crucial for analyzing data. Learn how to use tools like VLOOKUP, INDEX-MATCH, and advanced formulas to handle complex data tasks with ease.
Manage Data Effectively: Get tips on how to organize and clean your data efficiently. You'll learn how to format data, handle large datasets, and ensure your information is accurate and ready for analysis.
Create Clear Visuals: Find out how to make your data stand out with effective charts and graphs. Learn how to use features like conditional formatting and pivot charts to present your data in a way that is easy to understand and visually appealing.
Automate Tasks: Save time by automating repetitive tasks. Discover how to use Excel’s built-in tools and basic VBA to streamline your work, create custom functions, and make your workflow smoother.
Solve Problems Quickly: Get strategies for spotting and fixing errors in your Excel work. Learn how to use Excel’s error-checking tools to keep your data and formulas accurate.
By the end of this course, you'll have 101 practical Excel tips that will help you in your data analysis work. Whether you want to advance in your current job or open up new opportunities, these skills will help you stand out and achieve your goals. Join us and start mastering Excel today!

courses.title: CBAP Certification Practice Exams 2024
courses.bio: Master the CBAP exam with extensive practice tests based on the BABOK Guide v3.
courses.description:
Advance your career in business analysis by obtaining your Certified Business Analysis Professional (CBAP) credential through our meticulously designed course for 2024. This comprehensive program offers a wealth of practice exams that are closely aligned with the Business Analysis Body of Knowledge (BABOK) Guide v3. With more than 120 challenging questions, our course prepares you to excel in all facets of the CBAP examination. The significance of CBAP certification in refining your business analysis skills is immense, as this credential serves as a globally recognized industry standard.
Our course is structured to replicate the real exam experience. You will participate in five full-length practice exams, each consisting of 20 questions and timed sessions to help you hone your time management abilities. This setup allows for a thorough understanding of the material while mirroring the actual format of the CBAP exam. You will receive detailed feedback on every question, enabling you to pinpoint your strengths and areas that need further attention.
One of the standout features of this course is its accessibility and flexibility. You can study at your own pace, making it easier to juggle learning with your personal and professional obligations. With 24/7 access to course materials, you can quickly take quizzes or delve into more complex topics whenever it suits your schedule. This self-paced approach not only enhances your learning experience but also promotes regular practice, which is vital for mastering the content.
Recognizing that learners have diverse styles, this course employs a variety of learning tools and techniques. Emphasizing real-world applications, insights from experienced business analysis professionals are incorporated throughout. These knowledgeable instructors share valuable insights and proven strategies that prepare candidates for both the exam and real-world applications.
Additionally, our program concentrates on key domains highlighted in the CBAP certification framework, ensuring that you grasp essential concepts, techniques, and best practices in business analysis. The questions are crafted to challenge you, reflecting the latest trends and updates in the field, ensuring you study relevant content that will be featured on the actual exam.
Crucially, we equip you with effective test-taking strategies. You’ll learn how to analyze questions strategically, manage your time efficiently during the exam, and approach the test with reduced stress and heightened confidence. The course also offers techniques for marking questions for later review, allowing you to revisit challenging items before final submission, maximizing your potential score.
As you embark on this educational journey, significant outcomes await you. By the end of the course, you will have not only gained a deep understanding of the CBAP Exam content but also developed the ability to apply best practices across various organizational environments. This skillset is essential for advancing your career and making meaningful contributions to your organization.
Enroll today to confidently begin your preparation for the CBAP certification exam. Our commitment to providing regularly updated materials ensures that you are always engaged with the most current content available, empowering your success in professional endeavors. This course serves as a gateway to achieving your CBAP certification and unlocking new opportunities in the business analysis field.
target_audience: Aspiring business analysts aiming to secure their CBAP certification.

objectives: Students will use functions like LEFT, RIGHT, and MID to extract parts of text.

requirements: Microsoft Excel (Office 2021 or Microsoft 365) installed.

No prior advanced Excel skills required; suitable for beginners.
courses.description:
Working with Text Functions, equips learners with essential skills to manage and manipulate text data effectively in Excel. This section begins by introducing how Excel handles characters and codes, helping students understand the CODE function and its applications. Learners explore various methods to convert text case using functions like PROPER, enabling them to standardize data such as names or titles.
The chapter covers key functions for converting data types, including NUMBERVALUE, ARRAYTOTEXT, and VALUETOTEXT, which are vital for handling numbers stored as text or converting arrays into readable text formats. Students learn to format text and numbers precisely using the DOLLAR, FIXED, and TEXT functions, allowing for customized and professional data presentation.
Additionally, this chapter focuses on cleaning and preparing text data by applying functions such as TRIM and CLEAN to remove unwanted spaces and non-printable characters. The TEXTJOIN and REPT functions help learners combine and repeat text strings to build complex labels or text-based charts.
Students gain practical skills in extracting and manipulating text with LEFT, RIGHT, MID, FIND, SEARCH, REPLACE, and SUBSTITUTE functions, which are essential for parsing names, codes, or generating account numbers. The chapter also teaches how to remove specific unwanted characters, including line feeds, enhancing data quality.
By mastering these powerful text functions, learners will significantly improve their ability to clean, format, and analyze textual data, leading to more accurate and polished Excel workbooks.
target_audience: This course is for users who need to clean and format text data in Excel.
It’s ideal for those working with names, codes, or account numbers.
Users wanting to convert text case or handle character codes will benefit.
It suits learners who need to extract or replace parts of text strings.
This is perfect for those formatting numbers and dates stored as text.
Users aiming to join or repeat text for reports or charts will find it useful.
It helps anyone who wants to remove extra spaces or unwanted characters.
This section supports users creating dynamic text displays using Excel functions.
It’s designed for those handling complex text manipulations like substring searching.
Learners wanting to automate text processing and improve data accuracy will benefit.

【注意！】コース内ではPower BI Desktopのダウンロード、インストール方法には触れていません。事前にご準備ください。Power BI Desktopは、Microsoftのサイトより簡単に、無料でダウンロードできます
【注意！】Power BI Desktop起動時にサインインを求められますが、サインインは不要です
courses.description:
【みんなのPower BI Desktop入門講座】
Power BI Desktop、興味はあるけど、どこから手を付けてよいかわからない。なんだかデータサイエンティストといった高度な分析を行う人のためのツールみたいで、自分には難しすぎるのでは？
私も全く同じことを考えていました。
Power BI Desktopは、そんな敷居の高いツールではありません。このコースは、データサイエンティストや、超高度な分析を行う人ではなく、わたしを含めたフツーの人のためのPower BI Desktop入門講座です。


【Q. Power BI Desktopは難しい？ A. 全部やるならYes。でも、全体の２割さえ知ってれば、８割できます。】
みなさんこんにちわ。講師のマスカワシゲルです。私自身は、ファイナンスの仕事をしています。なにか仕事を楽にしてくれるツールはないか？と探している時、Power BI Desktopに出会いました。Power BI Desktopは、あのマイクロソフトが出しており、BIの分析ツールとしての性能は間違いなくトップクラスです。そして、何より、こんなにすごいソフトが、無料でダウンロードできる。これは使うしかありません。
そんなわけで、自分には難しすぎるのでは？という疑問を持ちつつも、Power BI Desktopの講習を受講しまくりました。延べ50時間以上のレクチャーを受けたことで、気づいたことがあります。
それは、私のようなデータサイエンティストでもない、フツーのユーザーには、講座内容の20%が分かれば、やりたいことの80%はできる。そして、ここまでくれば、たとえ不明点があっても、自分でYouTubeやインターネットから、答えを導くことができる、ということです。


【すぐに実戦投入できるスキル。実務で裏付けされています】
私は、この仮説をもとに、教わった内容を、実務で使える、役に立つ、という観点から再度構築しなおして、２時間の講習会にまとめました。そして、それを会社の同僚に受講してもらいました。
おどろいたことに、同僚たちは、受講したその週からレポートに、Power BI Desktopを使ったり、会議の場で、インタラクティブに使えるデータ資料として活用していました。このコースはこうしてできました。


【ふつうの人が実務で使う内容だけを厳選しました】
これだけ知っていれば、まったく使ったことがない状態から、Power BI Desktopを使いはじめることができる、という内容を２時間のコースにまとめました。このコースは、実際にみなさんが手を動かしながら、Power BI Desktopを使って、レポートを作り上げてく、使えるスキルを身に着けてもらうためのコースです。


【無用なおしゃべりはしません】
Power BIとは何か？どんなシーンで使えるのか？といった長ったるい話はしません。使ってみて、ご自身で、判断していただければと思います。Power BI Desktopのダウンロード＆インストールも、超簡単で、インターネットにサポート情報たくさんあるので、この講座では触れません。


【いきなりレポート作成→間髪入れずに課題→飛躍のための発展】
まずは、Power BI Desktop入門として、いきなりPower BI Desktopを使って、レポートを一緒に作り上げていきます。一通り操作に慣れたところで、課題を用意していますので、そこまで得たスキルを使って、レポート作成と問題に答えてもらいます。こうすることで、すでにあるスキルで、ここまでのことができる、というのを実感していただきます。課題の後には、発展の内容として、さらにPower BI Desktopを使いこなすためのテクニックを紹介します。


【今後使うか見極めたい、という人にもおススメ】
このコースは、Power BI Desktop、とにかく使ってみたい。という方の他、今後Power BI Desktopを使うかどうか短時間で見極めたい、という方にも最適です。


【受講を後押しする、リスクフリーな２つの理由】
このコースには、30日間返品保証がついています。それに、Power BI Desktop自体も無料ですので、みなさんは全くリスクなしにPower BI Desktopの世界に飛び込むことができます！


Power BI Desktop使ってみたいけど...と長らく悩むくらいだったらとりあえず２時間やってみませんか？
それでは、コースでお会いしましょう！
target_audience: Power BI Desktopとにかく使ってみたい方

Welcome to our comprehensive Udemy course on Data Storytelling with Power BI, designed to empower you with the skills to transform raw data into compelling, actionable reports and dashboards.
Data storytelling with Power BI is crucial for executives because it transforms complex data into clear, engaging, and actionable narratives that support strategic decision-making. By combining dynamic visuals like charts and KPIs with concise narratives, Power BI reports and dashboards simplify data analysis, highlight key trends, and enable executives to quickly identify opportunities or risks. Additionally, data storytelling fosters emotional connections and drives a data-driven culture, empowering executives to lead effectively and make informed decisions that propel organizational success.

requirements: There are no requirements for this course.
courses.description:
Why is executive data storytelling such an important skill to master?


A recent study by The Economist Group revealed these key insights about Executives:
90% of Executives agree:
“Gaining knowledge and becoming better informed is a priority to me.
93% of Executives agree:
“I am open to new ideas and experiences.”
Executives are open to new ways of seeing and understanding data.


But there is a major problem that exists as we show up and try to deliver data stories.
We don’t know our executives.
We don’t understand executive priorities.
We don’t deliver data stories.
In this course you will learn how to identify and craft visual data stories and narratives that work for executives. This course will equip you with new inspiration around how to communicate with and work with your Executives and your leaders as well as provide you with tools and techniques that you can immediately use to tell more effective data stories.

courses.title: Become a Supply Chain Data Scientist: Manage your Inventory
courses.bio: Become a Supply Chain Data Scientist: Master Inventory Optimization, Demand Forecasting, and Python Simulations
objectives: Understand the core principles of inventory systems, including raw materials, finished products, and supply chain connections.
Master essential inventory metrics like Economic Order Quantity (EOQ), Reorder Level (ROL), and Safety Stock to minimize costs.
Use Python to calculate demand variability, safety stock, reorder points, and implement simulations for real-world inventory problems.
Leverage data-driven approaches to forecast demand, optimize lead time, and align inventory levels with business goals.
Building world-class stochastic inventory simulations systems using Python
Building world-class Discrete event time inventory simulations systems using Python

Inventory Theory and building basic inve: Modeling Leadtime and Demand with Python
Understanding Service Level and Fill Rate
Inventory Optimizations and Building Det: Building a complete Inventory Model for Optimization
Discrete Event Simulations and Inventory: Building a Complete DES Inventory model for simulation

requirements: Basic knowledge of core programming concepts (preferably Python).
Familiarity with elementary statistics (mean, standard deviation, etc.).
courses.description:
Are you ready to become a sought-after Supply Chain and Inventory Data Scientist? This comprehensive, hands-on course will equip you with the Python-powered skills to master Inventory Optimization, Demand Forecasting, and Supply Chain Simulation, positioning you for exciting job opportunities in the data-driven supply chain and operations field.
Unlike theory-heavy programs, this course takes you step by step through real-world inventory challenges, teaching you how to analyze data, simulate variability, and optimize systems using industry-standard Data Science techniques. By combining Python coding, advanced statistical models, and proven Inventory Management strategies, you’ll build the expertise employers are actively seeking.
What You’ll Accomplish:
Master the fundamentals: Gain in-depth knowledge of critical inventory concepts, including Reorder Levels (ROL), Economic Order Quantity (EOQ), and Safety Stock, creating a solid foundation for supply chain analysis.
Code like a data scientist: Use powerful Python libraries like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib to model inventory performance, visualize trends, and make data-driven decisions that directly impact business outcomes.
Simulate like a pro: Build both stochastic and discrete-event simulations to tackle real-world supply chain chaos, such as fluctuating demand, lead times, and variability.
Forecast with confidence: Use advanced forecasting techniques to predict demand, optimize reorder points, and minimize costly stockouts and overstocking.
Implement proven strategies: Apply real-world inventory policies like Continuous Review and Periodic Review, and Fixed Order Quantity to maximize operational efficiency and cut costs.
Deliver actionable insights: Learn to analyze historical data, identify bottlenecks, and design optimized workflows tailored to business needs—from startups to global enterprises.
By the End of This Course, You Will:
Position yourself as a Supply Chain and Inventory Data Scientist—a career path in high demand across industries. Use this course as a portfolio project
Cut inventory costs and boost service levels, adding immediate value to any organization.
Transform inventory management strategies for businesses of all sizes, making you a key player in optimizing supply chains.
Why Take This Course?
The future of supply chain management is data-driven, and employers are seeking professionals who can bridge the gap between inventory management and data science. With this course, you’ll gain the tools and confidence to stand out in today’s competitive job market and land your dream role.
Let’s analyze, optimize, and simulate—together!
target_audience: Inventory Managers
Business Analysts
Data Analysts
Data Scientists
Supply Chain Specialist
Warehouse Managers
Operations Researchers

courses.description:
Tired of projects going off the rails due to unclear requirements?
You're not alone. Many IT projects fail because of poor communication and a lack of understanding of user needs.
As an IT Business Analyst, your success hinges on your ability to effectively Elicit, Analyze, and Document crystal-clear requirements.


Introducing: Requirement Elicitation Techniques for IT Business Analysts
Learn Proven Techniques To Effectively Elicit Crystal-Clear Requirements From Stakeholders And Other Sources!


I have over 19+ years of experience in the IT Industry and during my career, I worked with stakeholders from across the globe and successfully elicited requirements for hundreds of IT Projects using the proven techniques. I poured all my requirement elicitation experience to craft this course to help you learn and master requirement elicitation to succeed as an IT Business Analyst.


This course starts with the Introduction to Requirement Elicitation in an Enterprise to demonstrate:
How the IT Requirements originate from various sources
What are the different kinds of requirements
How the requirements are given to the IT Business Analyst (IT BA)
And the next steps peformed by an IT BA from Eliciting Requirements up to Specifying Requirements for the IT Team.
This will visualize a Big Picture of the Lifecyle of IT Requirements in an Enterprise from it’s inception to implementation with a focus on Elicit Requirements task.
After that, it takes you through the Fundamentals of IT Requirements to help you become familiar with IT Requirements and their characteristics to ensure that you consider them while Eliciting and Defining the Requirements:
What is a Requirement? - Defintion of a Requirement for developing IT / Software Systems.
Requirement Classification - Business Requirements, Stakeholder Requirements, Solution Requirements (Functional and Non-functional Requirements), and Transition Requirements.
Software Aspects & Quality Attributes - The basic building blocks of any software to function it properly.
SMART Requirements - The proven technique to define requirements and goals to ensure that they are Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant and Time-bounded.
Business Rules - Type of Business Rules, basic principles and the process to analyze and define business rules
Requirement Lifecycle - To understand various stages that the requirements goes through during their lifecycle and the tasks that need to be peformed to manage and maintain requirements.
Then, it dives into the following concepts of Requirement Elicitation:
Requirement Sources - Business Case, Business Requirement Document (BRD), CRM Tickets, Emails
Defintion of Requirement Elicitation
Overview of All the Requiement Elicitation Techniques
General Process Steps to Elicit Requirements - Prepare > Conduct > Confirm
Once you are fully clear on the fundamental concpets, this comprehensive course will help you master the following proven techniques to learn How to Elicit Requirements Effectively for Software Projects, IT Products and Services.
Brainstorming
Workshop
Interview
Observation
Survey/Questionnaires
Prototyping
Document Review/Analysis
Interface Analysis
Each Technique is Explained and Demonstrated with:
Fundamental Concepts
When to use the technique
Real-world Examples
Tools
Best Practices for Requirement Elicitation
Step-by-Step Process to Elicit Requirements, and
Downloadable Resources
This structured way of learning will help you completely understand and master the Requirement Elicitation Techniques to apply in your work practise and you'll be able to Elicit and Define all kinds of IT Requirements correctly to lay a solid foundation for developing a new software application from scratch or enhancing an existing software application with the new features.


Don't let unclear requirements derail your next project.
Enroll Now and become a Master of Requirement Elicitation!

Experienced IT Business Analysts who want to advance their Requirement Elicitation Skills using proven Tools and Techniques

requirements: No Data Analysis and Visualization experience required.
courses.description:
Data analysis is a process of inspecting, cleansing, transforming, and modelling data with the goal of discovering useful information, informing conclusions, and supporting decision-making.
Data visualization  deals with the graphic representation of data.
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming language.
Python is an interpreted high-level general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with its use of significant indentation. Its language constructs as well as its object-oriented approach aim to help programmers write clear, logical code for small and large-scale projects.
The Jupyter Notebook is a web-based interactive computing platform. The notebook combines live code, equations, narrative text, visualizations
Python has a powerful and most popular package ‘Pandas’ built on top of Numpy which has the implementation of many data objects and data operations. Pandas is one of the most famous data science tools and it’s definitely a game-changer for cleaning, manipulating, and analyzing data.
Pandas provide tools for reading and writing data into data structures and files. It also provides powerful aggregation functions to manipulate data.
Pandas provide extended data structures to hold different types of labeled and relational data. This makes python highly flexible and extremely useful for data cleaning and manipulation.
Pandas is highly flexible and provides functions for performing operations like merging, reshaping, joining, and concatenating data.
target_audience: Beginners to Data Analysis and Visualization

Lerne wie du mit SQL effektive Datenbankankabfragen durchführen kannst!
In diesem Kurs lernst du, wie du effizient Datenbankabfragen an deine Datenbank stellst. Dieser Kurs hilft dir nicht nur, wenn du später eine MySQL - Datenbank verwaltest möchtest, du kannst die im Kurs vermittelten Fähigkeiten auch mit einer Oracle-, Microsoft SQL Server, SQlite, oder PostgreSQL - Datenbank anwenden.
SQL ist eine unglaublich mächtige Sprache, mit der du effizient deine Datenbank verwalten kannst. Du lernst in diesem Kurs nicht nur die Grundlagen, sondern auch wie du umfangreiche Auswertungen erstellst, dafür sorgst, dass die Datenbank auch bei größeren Datenmengen weiterhin performant bleibt, und alles was du sonst als Programmierer im Zusammenspiel mit einer Datenbank benötigst.
Mit vielen Praxisbeispielen:
Dieser Kurs beinhaltet ganz viel Praxis. Und zwar keine langweiligen Beispiele, sondern Praxis, wo du das gelernte Wissen direkt anwenden kannst. Dazu installieren wir bei dir eine kleine Beispiel - Datenbank, und zu dieser Datenbank bekommst du dann immer wieder Aufgaben gestellt. Dadurch lernst du nicht nur die neuen Befehle kennen, du wendest sie auch direkt an, und kannst dein Wissen testen und festigen.
target_audience: Jeden, der mehr zum Thema SQL / MySQL lernen möchte, oder lernen möchte, wie er Daten auswerten kann

courses.title: Curso de Excel - Tablas dinámicas y gráficos interactivos
courses.bio: Analisis de datos con dashboards, graficas y tablas dinámicas aplicado a la cadena de suministro de basico a intermedio
objectives: Crear diferentes tipos de graficas interactivas y dinámicas
Elaborar tablas dinámicas desde cero utilizando el formato de tablas
Crear dashboard con segmentadores y listas de verificación sin necesidad de saber programación
Conocer y aplicar la famosa función BuscarV con ejemplos reales y muy practicos
Aplicar las funciones de Excel que mas se usan en la vida real (Indice, Coincidir, SumarSi, Contar,Si, Si, SiError, y otras mas)
Analizar datos por medio de tablas y gráficos interactivos
Combinar diferentes funciones de Excel en una sola formula
Aplicar el formato condicional para diferentes celdas o rangos de celdas
Utilizar los atajos de Excel mas usados que aumentaran tu productividad

Recorrido por el curso y panorama genera: Vista rápida del curso y de los ejercicios prácticos

requirements: Deseos de aprender Excel
Computadora con Excel
courses.description:
Microsoft Excel es una de las herramientas de inteligencia de negocios y análisis de datos mas usada, algunas cifras aproximadas son las siguientes:
Mas de 750 millones de personas de todo el mundo usan esta herramienta
80% de los negocios usan Microsoft Excel
En Wall Street usan Excel para crear modelos financieros complejos y,
Asociaciones gubernamentales también usan Excel para crear modelos complejos
Son muchas las ventajas que se tienen al tener conocimientos de esta poderosa herramienta, en esta curso te llevare desde básico a intermedio, te enseñare algunas de las funciones mas comunes y como combinarlas para crear grupos y poder analizar los datos, aprenderás a crear desde cero dashboard, graficas y tablas dinamicas y tambien a usar atajos y trucos.
Algunas de las herramientas y funciones mas usadas en Microsoft Excel son las siguientes:
Función BuscarV, BuscarH
Función Indice combinado con la funcion coincidir
Función Si, SiError
Funciones de Texto (Extrae, Izquierda, Derecha, Remplazar)
Función Contara, ContarSi, ContarSiConjunto
Función SumarSi, SumarSiConjunto
Funciones matematicas (sumar, restar, promedios, subtotales, redondear, redondear.mas, redondear.menosetc)
Formatos Condicionales
Función Escoger
Tablas dinámicas
Creación de diferentes tipos gráficos
Combinación de funciones, tablas y graficas dinámicas
Dominando todos los puntos anteriores y conociendo algunos atajos de acceso y movimientos rápidos puedes considerarte un usuario de nivel intermedio, podrás automatizar y ser mas eficiente en tu trabajo y tus análisis de datos.
El contenido resumido del curso es el siguiente:
Introducción general y estructura del curso
Función BuscarV
Funciones Indice y Coincidir
Funciones Si, SiError, Y
Funciones Izquierda, Derecha, Extraer
Función SumarSi, SumarSiConjunto, ContarSiConjunto
Función Concatenado
Ejercicios prácticos usando las funciones anteriores y combinando algunas de ellas
Graficas interactivas y dinámicas (usaremos BuscarV, Si, SiError, Y, Atajos y mas)
Listas de verificación (Utilizaremos las funciones SumarSi, SumarSiConjunto y el formato condicional)
Tablas dinámica básica y usos mas comunes (Se harán varias tablas dinámicas en base al formato tabla, formato de tabla dinámica y campos calculados)
Dashboard en base a tablas dinámicas y segmentadores (Aparte de usar diferentes tablas dinámicas, también se usaran segmentadores y la funcion importardatosdinamicos)
Otros usos y aplicaciones de BuscarV


En mi experiencia personal el aprendizaje fue con la practica y con la aplicación de los conocimientos adquiridos en los cursos que fui tomando, por esta razón he incluido como parte de los ejercicios algunos archivos sencillos que fueron hechos en base a ejemplos reales que usamos en nuestro trabajo actual, estoy seguro de que podrás obtener ideas de como se aplican las formulas y como analizar la información de forma sencilla, ya que actualmente yo sigo trabajando con este tipo de documentos y otros que son un poco mas complejos.
Vamos a empezar desde cero cada función y ejercicio
Te espero en el curso!
target_audience: Personas interesadas en aprender Excel desde lo básico hasta intermedio
Personas que ya tengan conocimientos intermedios de Excel y que quieran conocer como aplicar estos conocimientos en la vida real con ejemplos prácticos que usan actualmente las empresas
Estudiantes de todas de carreras que quieran empezar a utilizar Excel para analizar los datos
Profesionistas que trabajan o que tienen interés en el análisis de datos en la cadena de suministro o Logística

courses.title: 【한글자막】 Elasticsearch 8과 Elastic Stack : 이론과 실습
courses.bio: Elasticsearch 튜토리얼 - Elasticsearch, Kibana, Logstash, Beats를 사용한 빅데이터 검색, 분석과 시각화 + 인덱스 설정, 쿼리, 페이지 지정, 정렬, Elastic SQL
objectives: 클러스터에 Elasticsearch 8 설치 및 구성
검색 색인 및 매핑 생성
전체 텍스트 및 구조화된 데이터 검색
Elasticsearch로 데이터를 가져오기

버킷 및 메트릭을 사용한 구조화된 데이터 집계
Logstash 및 “ELK Stack"을 사용하여 Elasticsearch에 스트리밍 로그 데이터 가져오기
Filebeats와 Elastic Stack을 사용하여 대규모 스트리밍 데이터 가져오기
Kibana를 사용한 Elasticsearch 데이터 분석 및 시각화

웹 서비스 및 REST에 대한 이해도
Linux에 대한 이해도
JSON 형식 데이터에 대한 이해도
courses.description:
Elasticsearch 8과 Elastic Stack의 설치부터 운영까지!
인덱스 설정, 쿼리, 페이지 지정, 정렬, Elastic SQL과 보안관리 등 포함!
대형 웹사이트를 검색하고 빅데이터 세트를 분석하세요!


Elasticsearch 8과 Elastic Stack: 이론과 실습 강의를 선택해야 하는 이유
저희는 Coralogix와 협력하여 지금까지 본 것 중 가장 포괄적인 Elastic Stack 과정을 공동 제작했습니다. Elasticsearch 8은 대형 웹사이트에서 검색 기능을 제공할 뿐만 아니라 몇 밀리초 안에 빅데이터 세트를 분석할 수 있는 강력한 도구입니다. 점점 대중화되어가는 기술이고, 오늘날의 취업 시장에서 가치 있는 기술입니다. 이 과정은 15시간 분량의 영상을 포함하는 100여 개의 강의를 통해 Elasticsearch 8의 설치부터 운영을 전부 다룹니다.


Elasticsearch 8 클러스터에서 검색 인덱스를 설정하고 해당 데이터를 다양한 방법으로 쿼리하는 방법을 다룰 것입니다 (Elasticsearch 6 또는 7 에 대한 강의는 따로 준비되어 있습니다). 유사 검색, 부분 일치, 유형별 검색, 페이지 지정, 정렬 등을 배울 것입니다. 모든 강의는 이론뿐만 아니라 사용자의 PC에서 직접 Elasticsearch를 따라 실행할 수 있는 실습 예제를 포함하고 있습니다.


Elasticsearch 8의 새로운 기능을 살펴보고 Elasticsearch 7에서 더 이상 사용되지 않는 기능이 제거되었으므로 이제 Elasticsearch 명령의 모든 새로운 구문 요구 사항을 설명합니다. 거의 모든 실습 활동은 Elasticsearch 8과의 호환성을 보장하기 위해 다시 녹화되었습니다.


Elasticsearch 인덱스에 데이터를 가져올 때 종종 간과되는 문제를 다룰 것입니다. 원시 RESTful 쿼리, Elasticsearch API를 사용하는 스크립트, Spark 및 Kafka와 같은 빅데이터 시스템과의 연동 등 다양한 방법을 통해 대규모 데이터 세트에서 Elasticsearch를 시작하는 방법을 배울 것입니다. 또한 일반적으로 “ELK Stack" (Elasticsearch / Logstash / Kibana) 또는 “Elastic Stack”이라 불리는 Logstash 및 Filebeat를 사용하여 데이터를 Elasticsearch로 스트리밍할 것입니다.


Elasticsearch는 더 이상 단순히 검색만을 위한 것이 아니라 구조화된 데이터에 대한 강력한 집계 기능을 갖추고 있어 색인된 데이터에서 새로운 인사이트를 얻을 수 있습니다. 저희는 Elasticsearch를 사용하여 데이터를 버킷/분석하고, Elastic Stack의 웹 UI, Kibana, Kibana Lens를 사용하여 시각화할 것입니다.


클러스터의 상태를 모니터링하고 클러스터 확장 및 롤링 재시작과 같은 운영 작업을 수행하는 방법과 Elastic Stack에서 운영을 관리하는 방법을 배우게 됩니다. 또한 Amazon Opensearch Service와 Elastic Cloud를 사용해 클라우드에서 Elasticsearch 클러스터를 스핀업하는 방법도 알려드립니다.


Elasticsearch는 많은 일반적인 데이터 분석 요구사항에 대해 Hadoop, Spark, Flink보다 훨씬 더 빠른 대안으로 자리매김하고 있습니다.  이해해야 할 중요한 도구이며 사용하기 쉽습니다! 저와 함께 자세히 살펴보시면 그 모든 것을 보여드리겠습니다.


Elasticsearch 8과 Elastic Stack: 이론과 실습의 주요 학습 내용
클러스터에 Elasticsearch 8 설치 및 구성
검색 인덱스 및 매핑 생성
전체 텍스트 및 구조화된 데이터 검색
Elasticsearch로 데이터를 가져오기
Elasticsearch와 Spark, Kafka, 관계형 데이터베이스, S3 등의 시스템 연동
버킷 및 메트릭을 사용한 구조화된 데이터 집계
Logstash 및 “ELK Stack"을 사용하여 Elasticsearch에 스트리밍 로그 데이터 가져오기
Filebeats와 Elastic Stack을 사용하여 대규모 스트리밍 데이터 가져오기
Kibana를 사용한 Elasticsearch 데이터 분석 및 시각화
프로덕션 Elasticsearch 클러스터에서 작업 관리
아마존 Elasticsearch 서비스 및 Elastic Cloud를 포함한 클라우드 기반 솔루션 사용


강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 남겨주세요. 그래야 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)


강의에서 만나요!


-Frank 드림
target_audience: Elasticsearch를 사용하여 빅데이터를 검색/분석하려는 모든 기술자

courses.title: SQL lernen, schnell und einfach
courses.bio: Nach 2 Minuten schreibst du eine erste SQL-Abfrage, nach wenigen Stunden bist du fast schon ein Experte
objectives: Mit SQL gezielt Daten aus einer Datenbank abfragen
Spalten auswählen, nach Werten filtern und Spalten ordnen
Daten aggregieren und gruppieren
Mit Daten rechnen und Texte ändern

Einfache Datenabfrage und Filtern aus ei: 4. Übung - DISTINCT, COUNT und GROUP BY
Tabellen verbinden: Hintergrund zu relationalen Datenbanken und zum Verbinden von Tabellen
Tabellen verbinden - INNER und OUTER JOIN

requirements: Für das Üben der SQL-Abfragen in der Online-Testdatenbank benötigst du lediglich einen modernen Webbrowser mit aktiviertem Javascript, wie z.B. Chrome, Firefox, Safari oder Opera.
courses.description:
Daten werden immer wichtiger in unserem Leben. Jeder Einkauf, jede SMS, jeder Besuch auf Facebook produziert Unmengen von Daten. Diese werden in Datenbanken gespeichert und Firmen und Organisationen auf der ganzen Welt suchen Menschen, die diese Daten verstehen und auswerten können.
Egal ob du in Marketing, Controlling, Forschung oder Verkauf arbeitest, das Verständnis von Zahlen und der Zugang zu Datenbanken sind ein riesiges Plus für deine Karriere. Der erste Schritt zum Verstehen von Daten ist das Verstehen von SQL, der Sprache, mit der Daten abgefragt, modelliert und verändert werden können.
Egal ob du oder deine Firma Datenbanksysteme vor MySQL, TeraData, Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle oder MS Access nutzt. SQL ist eine standardisierte Abfragesprache, die mit leichten Abwandlungen mit fast allen relationalen Datenbanken genutzt werden kann.
Was lernst du in diesem Kurs?
Lerne schnell und praxisnah, wie du mit SQL Daten abfragst und so modellierst, dass sie dir helfen die wichtigsten Fragen zu beantworten.
In diesem Kurs erhältst du das nötige Wissen, um schnell in die Datenabfrage mit SQL einzusteigen. Mit den Übungen erhältst du Erfahrung und entwickelst die Sicherheit, das Gelernte auf die Probleme deines Alltags anzuwenden.
Ist dieser Kurs etwas für mich?
Wenn du eine handfeste Fähigkeit lernen möchtest, die dich beruflich weiter bringt, dann ist dieser Kurs wahrscheinlich genau richtig für dich. Arbeitnehmer, die sich mit Daten, Datenbanken und SQL auskennen, werden in fast allen beruflichen Bereichen gesucht. Sammelt dein Arbeitgeber oder dein Wunscharbeitgeber Daten? Lerne mit diesem Kurs, wie du sie nutzen kannst!
Auch wenn du selbstständig bist, ist es wichtig, die wichtigsten Daten deines Unternehmens zu verstehen. Auch die Datenbanken von Webseiten, Online-Shops, Kassensysteme und Kundensystemen können mit SQL analysiert werden. Wenn du in der Lage bist, diese Daten zu lesen und auszuwerten, kannst du wichtige Entscheidungen für die Zukunft deines Unternehmens treffen.
Kursaufbau
In diesem Kurs erkläre ich dir Schritt für Schritt die wichtigsten Funktionen von SQL. Die Videolektionen und Übungen bauen aufeinander auf und kommen so dem natürlichen Lernprozess entgegen. Innerhalb der ersten fünf Minuten schreibst du deine erste SQL-Abfrage und mit jeder Lektion werden deine Abfragen komplexer und gleichzeitig hilfreicher.
Beginne noch heute und lerne deine ersten SQL-Abfragen zu schreiben. In kurzer Zeit wirst du zum Daten-Jongleur!
target_audience: Dieser SQL-Kurs ist für Anfänger gedacht, die mit SQL nicht oder nur wenig vertraut sind oder für Teilnehmer, die ihre Kenntnisse auffrischen wollen. Vorkenntnisse sind nicht erforderlich.

courses.title: ChatGPTを活用した魅力的なプレゼンスライド作成講座【AI×自動化でタスク効率化】
courses.bio: AIを使って最短でプレゼンスライドを作成！ChatGPTで今すぐスタート！

初めに: このコースは随時アップデートしていきます。
なぜ、最短でプレゼン資料を作る必要があるのか？
どうやってプレゼン資料を最短にする？
パート1 スライドを作る能力は現代人の必須スキル: 1-1　プレゼン力は仕事からプライベートまで

パート4 キーボードを使わないテキスト入力パート1(chatGPT編): 4-4　AIに適切な回答を引き出すために

基礎的なインターネットの知識（Googleやヤフーで知らないことを検索して調べることができる、メールのやり取りができる など）
一般的なビジネスマナーのある方・これから勉強できる方
スマートフォンorパソコン（両方あるとベスト）
courses.description:
【最初にお読み下さい】
今話題の「ChatGPT」を用いたプレゼンスライド作成の講座になります。
この講座は具体的な事例をもとに、あなたのビジネスを拡大していけるようなコツを徹底的にお伝えします。
ChatGPTは、自然言語処理技術の一種であり、文章を生成することができる人工知能です。この技術を利用することで、プレゼンスライドの作成作業をスピードアップすることができ、効率的なタスク処理を実現することができます。


本コース全体で学べることは、下記の6つです。


・行動経済学の基礎知識
・人の行動を理解するために学ぶポイント
・人の行動を利用した仕掛けの事例
・行動経済学を利用した集客の事例


ChatGPTの入門講座として受講してください。
基礎から体系的かつ網羅的に分かりやすく解説しています。
GoogleにもUdemyにも無い「初心者向けでわかりやすい基礎講座の制作」を目指しました。


【本講座の内容】
①相手に伝わるプレゼンの型
②キーボードを使わないテキスト入力パート1(chatGPT編)
③キーボードを使わないテキスト入力パート2(音声認識入力編)
④デザインを学ばずにおしゃれなスライドを作る(Canva docs編)
などなど


【注意事項】
当サービスでは、企業秘密や裏ワザなど、他言厳禁の内容が含まれます。
数多くの人に知れ渡ってしまうと優位性を保てない可能性があります。
外部に漏らさないようご注意ください。
target_audience: スライドの作り方を基礎から体系的に学びたい人
スライドやChatGPTを利用してリストを集めたい方
在宅で収入を得たい方がChatGPTをもとに集客したい人
自分の商品やサービスを持っている方

courses.title: NotebookLM入門：情報整理とアイデア発想をAIで加速する
courses.bio: 第二の脳として、NotebookLMを活用しましょう！ドキュメント、Webサイト、さらにはYouTube動画といった様々な情報源を理解し、それに基づいて要約、質疑応答、アイデアの壁打ち、さらにはポッドキャストの作成まで行うことが可能です。
objectives: NotebookLMの基礎について学びます。
NotebookLMを活用したレポート作成、スライド生成、新規ビジネスの立案、ポッドキャストの生成などについて学びます。
NotebookLMを「第二の脳」として活用する方法を学びます。
生成AIを活用した情報の整理、およびコンテンツの自動生成について学びます。
学習、リサーチ、あるいはクリエイティブな作業を劇的に効率化する方法を学びます。

NotebookLMの応用: ポッドキャストをSpotifyに投稿する

requirements: プログラミングや数学の知識、経験は不要です。
生成AIの技術的な知識は不要です。
最新の情報をカバーしていない可能性があります。2025年5月までの情報を元にした講座です。
NotebookLMには無料版と有料版がありますが、講義の受講には無料版で十分です。
courses.description:
「NotebookLM入門」は、溢れる情報を効率的に整理し、AIの力で新たなアイデアやコンテンツを生み出したいと考えているすべての方のための講座です。
Googleによって開発されたNotebookLMは、あなたがアップロードしたドキュメント、Webサイト、さらにはYouTube動画といった様々な情報源を理解し、それに基づいて要約、質疑応答、アイデアの壁打ち、さらにはポッドキャストの作成までをサポートする革新的なAI搭載リサーチ・ライティングアシスタントです。


本講座では、専門的なAIの知識がなくても、NotebookLMの直感的な操作を学び、あなたの学習、リサーチ、そしてクリエイティブな作業を劇的に効率化する方法を習得します。
大量の資料を読み解く時間を短縮したい方、新しい視点からアイデアを深めたい方、質の高いコンテンツを迅速に作成したい方に最適です。


講座の内容は以下の通りです。
Section1. NotebookLMの基礎
- NotebookLMの機能と基本操作、そしてその魅力と可能性について学びます。
Section2. NotebookLMの応用
-NotebookLMを日々の業務や学習に組み込み、生産性を飛躍させる方法を学びます。


この講座を通じて、NotebookLMをあなたの強力な「第二の脳」として活用し、情報過多の時代をスマートに生き抜くスキルを身につけましょう。
あなたの知的生産性を、NotebookLMと共に次のレベルへと引き上げます。
target_audience: 仕事をサポートする秘書的な存在、もしくは第二の脳が欲しい方。
NotebookLMについて包括的に学びたい方。
情報の整理、活用を迫られているビジネスパーソンの方。
膨大な情報を整理し、有用な知見を抽出したい方。
発想の源泉として、様々な情報を収集したい方。
ポッドキャストを手軽に作りたい配信者の方。
最新の生成AIサービスを学びたい方。

courses.title: Prozessmodellierung mit BPMN 2.0 Vom Einsteiger zum Experten
courses.bio: Geschäftsprozesse einfach modelliert: komplexe Prozesse und Zusammenhänge verständlich und standardkonform darstellen
objectives: Prozessmodelle in BPMN 2.0 erstellen
Standardkonforme und leicht verständliche Kollaborations- und Prozessdiagramme erstellen
Modellierung von Abläufen, Nachrichten, Ereignissen und Ausnahmesituationen
Modellierung von Haupt-, Teil-, Aufruf- und Ereignisprozessen

Einstieg und erste Grundlagen: Worum geht es? Herausforderung, Zielsetzung und Vorstellung
Warum BPMN? Vorteile, Definition und Abgrenzung
Modellierungs-Software - Was es zu beachten gibt
Praxisübung "Aktivitätstypen, Artefakte und Datenobjekte" - Ab in den Urlaub!
Weitere Grundlagen - Aktivitätsmarkierungen, Gateways und Nachrichten
Fortgeschrittene Modellierung mit BPMN 2: Praxisübung "Finde die Fehler 2" - Schwierige Fehler finden
BPMN 2.0-Modellierung für Experten: Praxisübung "Störungen" - Ich will in den Freizeitpark!
Der Weg zum Prozessmodell - Interviews und Fragetechniken
Ausblick - Wie es weiter gehen kann

requirements: Modellierungs-Software (kostenfreie und webbasierte Varianten werden im Kurs vorgestellt)
Basiskenntnisse zur PC-Bedienung
courses.description:
Die Kursteilnehmer werden in diesem Kurs vom Einsteiger zum Experten in der Prozessmodellierung mit BPMN 2.0. Wir beginnen mit den Grundlagen der Prozessmodellierung und arbeiten uns dann in überschaubaren Schritten durch sämtliche Themengebiete.
Der locker vermittelte Kurs richtet sich sowohl an Menschen mit einem eher fachlichen Fokus als auch an echte Techies. Gemeinsam lernen wir, wie Prozesse realitätsnah und doch übersichtlich und verständlich modelliert werden können.
Von den Basics in einfachen Prozessabläufen über Ereignisbehandlung bis hin zu Besonderheiten der Prozesssteuerung lernen wir alles Wesentliche aus dem praktischen Standard.
Begleitet wird alles mit vielen Praxisübungen, welche die gelernten Inhalte mit einem Augenzwinkern noch einmal verankern.
target_audience: Alle Personen, die sich mit Geschäftsprozessen auseinander setzen.
Fachliche Mitarbeiter, die ihre Prozesse verständlich und umfangreich dokumentieren wollen.
Technische Mitarbeiter, die Prozesse für die IT-Unterstützung vorbereiten und mit dem Fachbereich klären möchten.
Business Analysten und Mitarbeiter mit Querschnittsaufgaben

courses.bio: Modelos de Credit Scoring, Análisis de Crédito y Administración del Riesgo Financiero con Python
objectives: Aprenderás a utilizar Python desde cero
Entender los fundamentos del riesgo crediticio: pérdida esperada (EL), probabilidad de incumplimiento (PD), pérdida dado incumplimiento (LGD) y exposición (EAD)
Desarrollaras habilidades en la evaluación del crédito: podrás construir un credit scoring a partir del modelo de probabilidad de incumplimiento
Crearás modelos predictivos de riesgo crediticio: desde la limpieza y el preprocesamiento hasta la estimación y validación del modelo.
Aprender a utilizar diferentes técnicas estadísticas para construir modelos predictivos precisos y confiables que podrás utilizar para evaluar prestatarios

requirements: El curso incluye una introducción a Python desde cero, por lo que no tiene prerrequisitos más allá de un conocimiento básico de estadística y muchas ganas de aprender
courses.description:
Si estás interesado en impulsar tu carrera en finanzas aprendiendo a crear modelos de riesgo de crédito efectivos con la ayuda de Python, uno de los lenguajes de programación más versátiles y demandados ¡Este curso es para ti!
Soy Carlos Martínez, tengo un MBA de INCAE y un Ph.D. en Management de la Universidad de Saint Gallen en Suiza. Como académico he presentado mi investigación en algunas de las más prestigiosas conferencias en universidades muy relevantes a nivel global y también soy coautor de más de de 25 casos de enseñanza algunos de ellos incluidos en las bases de casos de universidades muy reconocidas como Harvard y Michigan.
En 2020 decidí que ya no quería trabajar en universidades y descubrí que mi propósito en la vida sería compartir contenidos de clase mundial a un precio simbólico en plataformas en línea para ayudar a la mayor cantidad de personas a desarrollar habilidades demandadas en el entorno laboral.
Con este curso, aprenderás a utilizar las herramientas más avanzadas de Python para crear modelos de riesgo de crédito precisos y efectivos. Desde la limpieza y el preprocesamiento de los datos hasta la construcción y validación de modelos, cubrimos todo lo que necesitas saber para convertirte en un experto en la gestión de riesgos financieros. Y lo mejor de todo, utilizando una base con datos reales lo que implica que obtendrás una experiencia práctica en un entorno profesional.

Los estudiantes ideales de este curso son profesionales en el área financiera que estén interesados en desarrollar sus habilidades de programación en Python para aplicarlo al análisis de crédito y la gestión de riesgo financieros. Por otro lado, este curso también podría resultar muy útil a estudiantes universitarios o recién graduados que ya tengan bases en Python y que estén interesados en desarrollarse en el área financiera aprendiendo modelos muy utilizados y demandados en el entorno profesional.
Este curso tiene un contenido similar al impartido por escuelas de negocios a nivel de maestría y cursos de educación ejecutiva, incluso con un mayor nivel de detalle en el preprocesamiento de los datos. El curso incluye una introducción a Python desde cero, por lo que no tiene prerrequisitos más allá de un conocimiento básico de estadística y muchas ganas de aprender.
Te invito a que revises la información del curso y te inscribas. ¡Nos vemos en la primera clase!
target_audience: Profesionales en el área financiera que estén interesados en desarrollar sus habilidades de programación en Python para aplicarlo al análisis de crédito y la gestión de riesgo financieros.

Estudiantes universitarios o recién graduados que ya tengan bases en Python y que estén interesados en desarrollarse en el área financiera aprendiendo modelos muy utilizados y demandados en el entorno profesional.

Módulo V - Filtros de perguntas e de Pai: Melhorando o filtro de pergunta por servidor
Filtro de Painéis com mais perguntas
Módulo VI - Configurações: Como alterar o banco de dados padrão do Metabase de H2 para Postgres
Visualização de dados com a visão tendência

requirements: Ter um computador com acesso a internet, com software seguintes softwares instalados: Java 7/8/11, Dbeaver Community ou outro gerenciador de bancos de dados, PostgreSQL e um navegador web de preferência chrome ou chromium
courses.description:
Olá, seja bem vindo ao curso: Visualização de Dados com Metabase, tenho que dizer: palavras são legais trazem significado ao contexto, mas, uma imagem, um gráfico, uma representação, um mapa, agregam valores de forma instantânea e quase sem esforço ao seu público, isso devido a mente humana ser muito receptiva à informações visuais, devemos lembrar que são milhões de anos de aprimoramento da visão.
Neste contexto de apresentação de informações de forma visual, ferramentas como o Metabase geram uma credibilidade a sua marca e carreira, e saber usar os seus recursos vai ser um verdadeiro upgrade naquele projeto que você está envolvido neste momento. A visualização de dados está em toda parte, seja no mundo real ou virtual.
Podemos usar visualização de dados para apesentar informações de forma mais fácil, identificar tendências, reforçar argumento e opiniões, destacar pontos importantes de uma pesquisa realizada com uma massa de dados relevante, enfim, em diversas áreas de muitas profissões os dados e suas visualizações são importantes no dia a dia.
No curso nos esforçamos para apresentar todo o poder do Metabase de uma forma leve e gostosa de aprender, elaboramos uma historia com dados reais extraídos do Portal da Transparência do Governo Federal para que fizesse sentido o que estava sendo explicado. Assim, para cada recurso explorado da ferramenta, uma historia foi contada formando um sentido.
Vamos nessa, conhecer essa ferramenta maravilhosa e linda!!
target_audience: Iniciantes em ferramentas de visualização de dados
Iniciantes em Metabase

courses.title: Power BI 数据转换
courses.bio: Power BI入门指南
objectives: 1.初步了解并熟悉Power Query
2.能借助Power Query，批量导入合并多个工作表或工作簿。
3.能借助Power Query，进行简单的数据整理。
4.通过实操演示，掌握操作步骤及操作中的重点内容
requirements: 0基础适用
courses.description:
Power BI 中的 Power Query 编辑器可针对千万级数据进行调整和转换。这种海量数据处理的能力，可以极大地降低重复劳动。因此，若想充分使用 Power BI，了解并熟悉 Power Query 必不可少。
三节课邀请到国内大型零售集团数据分析师艾欧里亚老师与你分享他在使用Power BI 进行数据转换时的妙招。老师会通过实操演示为你细致呈现操作步骤和重点内容，同时，借助案例数据 ETL 实操，你将对此有更深刻的体会。希望这门课能助力你招招致胜，成为高效达人。
会收获以下收益：
1.初步了解并熟悉Power Query，
2.能借助Power Query，批量导入合并多个工作表或工作簿。
3.能借助Power Query，进行简单的数据整理。
4.通过实操演示，掌握操作步骤及操作中的重点内容

courses.title: Supply Chain Analytics: Demanda, Precios, Stock con Power BI
courses.bio: Crea storytellings narrativas, intuitivas y predictivas para analizar la demanda, los precios y el stock en los negocios
objectives: Contar historias avanzadas y analíticas con datos.
Storytelling con Microsoft Power BI.
Crear informes Descriptivos, Productivos y Narrativos con Power BI.
Analizar la Demanda, los precios y el stock de una empresa.
Manejo avanzado de Power BI.
Integrar el Software R con Objetos Visuales en Power BI.

Introducción: ¡No califiques el curso antes de tiempo!
Software R como motor analítico de datos
Extendiendo capacidades con Custom Visuals Power BI
Modelado de datos: Conexión y modelado de datos parte 1
Conexión y modelado de datos parte 2
Conexión y modelado de datos parte 3

requirements: Conocimientos previos en Microsoft Power BI.
Entendimiento básico de estadística descriptiva y modelos predictivos.
Disponer de una computadora con Microsoft Power BI Desktop (versión gratuita).
Instalar R y RStudio en la computadora (software libre - gratuito).
courses.description:
La dinámica cambiante en los negocios en la actualidad requiere que la inteligencia de negocios o Business Intelligence de pasos hacia adelante y contribuya con información no solo del pasado o del presente con evolución y KPIs o indicadores clave de desempeño por sus siglas en ingles, sino que vaya más allá pasando del análisis descriptivo, al predictivo.
Es necesario incorporar variables del futuro en los análisis, agrupando una variedad de técnicas estadísticas de modelización y minería de datos para analiza la información actual e histórica para realizar predicciones acerca del futuro o acontecimientos no conocidos.
Es lo que vamos a trabajar en este curso, vamos a entender un poco el contexto del tema acerca de la necesidad de analizar la demanda, los precios y el stock de la empresa.
Posteriormente, conversaremos un poco sobre el rol del Microsoft Power BI y el software estadístico R como herramientas para preparar esta información.
Y como parte principal del curso haremos el desarrollo de un informe en Microsoft Power BI, agregando algunos objetos visuales personalizados que ejecutan scripts de R, todo esto para convertirlo en un avanzado informe descriptivo, predictivo y narrativo que lleva el Business Intelligence al siguiente nivel y esto lo podrás poner en practica en tu trabajo y agregar valor a la organización que es parte de la finalidad del rol de una analista de BI o analista de datos en la empresa.
target_audience: Analistas de Datos.
Analistas de Business Intelligence.
Profesionales con funciones analíticas en las empresas.
Involucrados en gerencia, manejo, coordinación de Supply Chain, compras y almacenes.
Todo aquel que desea agregar valor a su currículo.

objectives: Aprenda sobre todas as funções vitais para análises profissionais
Como extrair super insights através de tabelas dinâmicas e usar os dados para tomar decisões informadas.

requirements: Vontade se tornar profissional em Google Sheets / Google Planilhas.
courses.description:
Por que esse curso é diferente?

Porque é para quem quer se tornar um profissional do Google Planilhas / Google Sheets, de forma rápida.

Esse é o único curso de Planilhas Google que você vai precisar se você quiser ter confiança para fazer análises de dados!


O que você vai aprender?
Você vai aprender sobre todas as funções vitais para análises profissionais no Google Planilhas / Google Sheets!


Nós vamos ver como extrair super insights através de tabelas dinâmicas e usar os dados para tomar decisões informadas.


Vai aprender sobre produtividade e design de planilhas e relatórios para que você possa impressionar, não só com as suas análises, mas também com o visual do seu trabalho.


O que inclui também, é claro, a aprender a criar gráficos profissionais para que você domine a visualização de dados.


Você vai aprender sobre todos os recursos que vão otimizar o seu trabalho e o da sua equipe e que vão fazer de você um verdadeiro especialista em Planilhas Google.


Além, inclusive, de conhecer os recursos avançados que as planilhas tem a oferecer.


O curso é para você?
Seja começando do zero ou com conhecimento  prévio em Planilhas Google, esse curso foi feito para você que quer:


Ganhar Autoconfiança em análise de dados
Desenvolver capacidade de interpretar dados complexos
Aprender a criar visualizações de dados convincentes
E aprimorar sua resolução de problemas a partir das Planilhas do Google.


Esse curso é diferente pois eu fiz questão de fazer ele de forma compacta, repleto de exercícios práticos para que você possa, no menor tempo possível, se tornar um especialista nessa ferramenta.


Durante o curso, foi incluído também um meme ou outro, para deixar o seu aprendizado mais leve e divertido.




E por quê que você deve confiar em mim para te ensinar sobre Planilhas Google / Google Sheets?
Meu nome é Tarik e nos mais de 10 anos da minha carreira eu fiz milhares de análises para empresas do mundo inteiro, como por exemplo, a Dell Technologies do Estados Unidos, o Grupo O Boticário do Brasil e o Grupo Straumann da Suiça.


Portanto, esse curso também traz consigo a experiência que adquiri a partir de de diversas ferramentas e anos de análises.

Posso dizer com confiança, que ao completar o curso, você estará preparado/preparada para fazer análises profissionais, com nível internacional de qualidade.


Projeto Real
Ao final do curso, você terá um projeto de análise, baseado em fatos reais, para aplicar tudo o que aprendeu e responder uma pergunta de negócio, com um um dashboard.


Não perca mais tempo. Olha o precinho desse curso da Udemy aqui.


Vem comigo e vamos juntos para você se tornar mestre/mestra das planilhas.
target_audience: Para profissionais de negócio, com foco em análise de dados.

courses.title: 【 はじめてのデータ分析 】データの読み解き方の基本マスターコース
courses.bio: 多くの人が悩む「自分は数字が苦手・・・」を解決するコースです。分析の基本である「比較する」「分解する」から始め、平均値、分布、ヒストグラムなどの読み方、さらに数値の考え方（確証バイアス、フェルミ推定）までマスター。初心者から受講できます！
objectives: 数字を読むときのコツ
大量のデータを見たときに、落ち着いて代表値や分布などを見ることができるスキル
データの良し悪し、原因について、比較や分解などの視点から整理するスキル
誤解を招くグラフ表現について、冷静に読み取るスキル
フェルミ推定など、市場規模などを推定するスキル

1つのデータを読み解く（比較と分解）: 講義スライドのダウンロード
比較する(1) 過去と比較
比較する(2) 他と比較
比較する(3) 第三者データと比較
比較する(4) 常識・経験と比較
分解する(1) 商品別に分解
分解する(2) 顧客別に分解
分解する(3) 期間で分解
分解する(4) プロセスで分解
大量のデータを読み解く（代表値、分布、傾向、関係性）: 講義スライドのダウンロード
分布(1) ヒストグラム
まとめ(1) 代表値と分布
傾向(2) ヒートマップ
関係性(4) 混合グループ
まとめ(2) 傾向、関係性
データを正しく読む: 講義スライドのダウンロード
サンプル(1) サンプル数
サンプル(2) データの偏り
【確認テスト】コースの理解度をチェックしよう: 【確認テスト】コースの理解度をチェックしよう

requirements: 前提条件はありません。どなたでも気軽に受講できます！
courses.description:
数値データを読み解くコツは、いろいろな視点で数字を見ていくことで、「このデータは、こういう特徴があるな」というイメージをつかんでいくことです。
この経験を積むことで、数字を見たときに何を考えるべきか、 ピンとくるようになる（＝数字に強い人）を目指すことができます。


このコースでは、この数字を読み解くときの「視点」について幅広くご紹介します。


1.   初級：1つのデータを読む


比較する
分解する
比率で見る
○○あたりで見る
データの定義
データの前提条件


2.   中級：大量のデータを読む


平均値、中央値
分布
ヒストグラム
標準偏差
傾向
関係性


3.   上級：データを正しく読む


グラフの注意点
サンプルの注意点
データの偏り
異常値、欠損値
確証バイアス
フェルミ推定
target_audience: はじめてデータを見る社会人1年目

データ分析結果を整理してプレゼンすることになったビジネスパーソン

courses.title: 【実戦で学ぶデータサイエンス講座】リレーショナルデータベースで始めるデータ活用とデータ分析のためのSQLを学ぼう
courses.bio: 【データサイエンス/データエンジニアリングシリーズ】データ分析向けのSQLを学んで提案に説得力を持たせよう
objectives: リレーショナルデータベースの基礎からSQLを学びます

Excelでとリレーショナルデータベースを比べてみよう: データベースとは何者？Excelはデータベスではない？Exceの弱点と限界は？
